content: That's a great approach. I think I'll create a "Guitar Goals" playlist and add songs I want to learn, and keep my "Guitar Inspiration" playlist focused on songs that motivate me to play. I've been watching YouTube tutorials and considering taking lessons from a local music school, so having a playlist of songs I want to learn will definitely help me stay focused. Speaking of YouTube tutorials, do you have any tips on how to make the most out of online lessons and tutorials?
